---
title: "/chop"
---

<!-- This file is generated by scripts/wiki/renderCommandsDoc.ts. -->

[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Chop logs using the Woodcutting skill.

**Usage**

- `/chop name:<string> [quantity:<integer>] [powerchop:<boolean>] [forestry_events:<boolean>] [twitchers_gloves:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The tree you want to chop. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity of logs you want to chop (optional). | - |
| `powerchop` | `boolean` | No | Set this to true to powerchop. Higher xp/hour, No loot (default false, optional). | - |
| `forestry_events` | `boolean` | No | Set this to true to participate in forestry events. (default false, optional). | - |
| `twitchers_gloves` | `string` | No | Change the settings of your Twitcher's gloves. (default egg, optional) | - |

**Examples**

- `/chop name:Logs`
